section.programlisting: 732 { 733 versor v1 = {-100.0f, -200.0f, -10.0f, -10.0f}; 734 versor v2 = {100.0f, 200.0f, 10.0f, 10.0f}; 735 versor v3; 736 737 GLM(quat_lerpc)(v1, v2, 0.5f, v3); 738 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 0.0f)) 739 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 0.0f)) 740 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 0.0f)) 741 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 0.0f)) 742 743 GLM(quat_lerpc)(v1, v2, 0.75f, v3); 744 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 50.0f)) 745 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 100.0f)) 746 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 5.0f)) 747 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 5.0f)) 748 749 GLM(quat_lerpc)(v1, v2, -1.75f, v3); 750 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], -100.0f)) 751 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], -200.0f)) 752 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], -10.0f)) 753 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], -10.0f)) 754 755 GLM(quat_lerpc)(v1, v2, 1.75f, v3); 756 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[0], 100.0f)) 757 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[1], 200.0f)) 758 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[2], 10.0f)) 759 ASSERT(test_eq(v3[3], 10.0f)) 760 761 TEST_SUCCESS 762 }

section.title: TEST_IMPL()[34/39]
section.para: Definition at line 894 of file test_quat.h.
section.programlisting: 894 { 895 vec3 v1 = {1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, v2 = {1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f}; 896 versor q; 897 898 /* rotate X around Y = -Z */ 899 glm_quatv(q, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 900 GLM(quat_rotatev)(q, v1, v1); 901 902 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 0.0f)) 903 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 0.0f)) 904 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], -1.0f)) 905 906 /* rotate -Z around X = Y */ 907 glm_quatv(q, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_XUP); 908 GLM(quat_rotatev)(q, v1, v1); 909 910 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], 0.0f)) 911 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 1.0f)) 912 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], 0.0f)) 913 914 /* rotate Y around Z = -X */ 915 glm_quatv(q, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_ZUP); 916 GLM(quat_rotatev)(q, v1, v1); 917 918 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[0], -1.0f)) 919 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[1], 0.0f)) 920 ASSERT(test_eq(v1[2], 0.0f)) 921 922 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 923 glm_quatv(q, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 924 GLM(quat_rotatev)(q, v2, v2); 925 926 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], 1.0f)) 927 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 928 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], -1.0f)) 929 930 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 931 glm_quatv(q, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 932 GLM(quat_rotatev)(q, v2, v2); 933 934 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 935 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 936 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], -1.0f)) 937 938 /* rotate v2 around Y by 90deg */ 939 glm_quatv(q, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_YUP); 940 GLM(quat_rotatev)(q, v2, v2); 941 942 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 943 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], 1.0f)) 944 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 945 946 /* rotate v2 around X by 90deg */ 947 glm_quatv(q, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_XUP); 948 GLM(quat_rotatev)(q, v2, v2); 949 950 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], -1.0f)) 951 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], -1.0f)) 952 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 953 954 /* rotate v2 around Z by 90deg */ 955 glm_quatv(q, GLM_PI_2f, GLM_ZUP); 956 GLM(quat_rotatev)(q, v2, v2); 957 958 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[0], 1.0f)) 959 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[1], -1.0f)) 960 ASSERT(test_eq(v2[2], 1.0f)) 961 962 TEST_SUCCESS 963 }
